Name: logik
About the game: Solve Puzzles! In logik, you can solve many chill & challenging puzzles of varying difficulty. Puzzles are organized into sections, each with unique color schemes. Puzzle Types There are two types of puzzles that are playable: regular and slide levels. Regular levels have scenarios where the player must move the striped block out of the puzzle area. Slide levels start with the striped block being mis-aligned to the exit, allowing the player to slide the striped block, with other blocks, in line with the exit. An Extra Challenge If you’re looking for an extra challenge on top of the rest of the challenging puzzles, there is Challenge Mode! Challenge Mode is a way to escape the main sections and try something…well, a little more difficult Is this game for you? If you are unsure if this game is for you, take this quick test below! 1. Puzzle 2. Challenging 3. Chill/Relaxing 4. Stylized Graphics 5. Atmospheric If you like some of these genres, you will probably like logik! (Note: This game and descriptions are subject to change. Nothing is final yet. )
